Roamer Transport, Inc. Sponsored NOW HIRING Over The Road Drivers in Texas! If you are looking for a better driving experience, then look no further! We are currently looking for experienced OTR drivers and are offering a $2,500 sign on bonus for a limited time! Job Type: Full-time PAY: $70,000.00 - $85,000.00+ per year BENEFITS: ✅ Dental insurance ✅ Life insurance ✅ Paid time off ✅ Pet rider program ✅ Referral program ✅ Safety equipment provided ✅ Vision insurance We are a refrigeration carrier out of Idaho Falls, ID. We run primarily the Northwest as well Midwest, South and the Southeast. We pride ourselves on having an attentive dispatch and doing our best to give our drivers as much home time as possible. WHY CHOOSE US? ✅ We Care About Our Drivers ✅ Friendly 24/7 Dispatch ✅ On-site Mechanics ✅ Customized Routes ✅ Late Model Trucks ✅ Benefits that Matter ✅ Additional Pay ✅ 5 Star Driver Rated Simply put, we are a refrigerated transportation company with GREAT people, GREAT pay & GREAT miles. SCHEDULE: - Home time - Home weekly - Year round work SUPPLEMENTAL PAY: - Bonus pay - Breakdown pay - Detention pay - Extra stop pay - Layover pay - Performance bonus - Safety bonus - Signing bonus EXPERIENCE: - Driving: 2 years (Required) LICENSE/CERTIFICATION - CDL A (Required) Do you have the drive? Apply in Minutes! ROAMERTRANSPORT.COM Now Hiring OTR Drivers in Texas! Apply now
